TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Queue`1<T> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public Class Queue(Of T) Implements ICollection, IEnumerable(Of T), IReadOnlyCollection(Of T)
generic <typename T> public ref class Queue : System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyCollection<T>, System::Collections::ICollection
type Queue<'T> = class interface seq<'T> interface ICollection interface IReadOnlyCollection<'T> interface IEnumerable

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 指定队列中元素的类型。

span.span: Specifies the type of elements in the queue.

summary.span: 表示对象的先进先出集合。

span.span: Represents a first-in, first-out collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类将泛型队列实现为循环数组。This class implements a generic queue as a circular array. 存储在中的对象将在一端插入并从另一个中删除。Objects stored in a are inserted at one end and removed from the other. 如果需要临时存储信息，则队列和堆栈非常有用;也就是说，当你可能想要在检索元素值后丢弃该元素时。Queues and stacks are useful when you need temporary storage for information; that is, when you might want to discard an element after retrieving its value. 如果需要以存储在集合中的相同顺序访问该信息，请使用。Use if you need to access the information in the same order that it is stored in the collection. 如果需要按相反的顺序访问该信息，请使用。Use if you need to access the information in reverse order. 如果需要从多个线程同时访问集合，请使用或。Use or if you need to access the collection from multiple threads concurrently. 可以对及其元素执行三个主要操作：Three main operations can be performed on a and its elements: - 将一个元素添加到的末尾。 adds an element to the end of the . - 从的开头移除最旧的元素。 removes the oldest element from the start of the . - 速览返回位于开始处的最早的元素，但不将其从中移除。 peek returns the oldest element that is at the start of the but does not remove it from the . 的容量是可容纳的元素数。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 当向添加元素时，将根据需要通过重新分配内部数组来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 可以通过调用来减少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 接受`null`作为引用类型的有效值，并允许重复元素。 accepts `null` as a valid value for reference types and allows duplicate elements. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了泛型类的几个方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class. 此代码示例创建具有默认容量的字符串队列，并使用方法将五个字符串进行排队。The code example creates a queue of strings with default capacity and uses the method to queue five strings. 枚举队列的元素，而不会更改队列的状态。The elements of the queue are enumerated, which does not change the state of the queue. 方法用于取消对第一个字符串的排队。The method is used to dequeue the first string. 方法用于查看队列中的下一项， 然后使用方法将其取消排队。 The method is used to look at the next item in the queue, and then the method is used to dequeue it. 方法用于创建数组，并将队列元素复制到该数组，然后将数组传递给采用的构造函数，创建队列的副本。 The method is used to create an array and copy the queue elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the queue. 将显示副本的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 创建队列大小两倍的数组，并使用方法从数组中间开始复制数组元素。An array twice the size of the queue is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 在开始时，将再次使用构造函数来创建包含三个 null 元素的队列的第二个副本。 The constructor is used again to create a second copy of the queue containing three null elements at the beginning. 方法用于显示字符串 "四" 位于队列的第一个副本中，在此之后，方法会清除副本，属性显示该队列为空。 The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the queue, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the queue is empty. [!code-csharp[Generic.Queue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Queue/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Generic.Queue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Queue/vb/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此类型的公共静态（在 Visual Basic）成员是线程安全的。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 只要不修改集合，就可以同时支持多个读取器。

span.span: A can support multiple readers concurrently, as long as the collection is not modified.

threadsafe.span: 尽管如此，枚举集合本身并不是一个线程安全的过程。

span.span: Even so, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 对于线程安全队列，请参阅。

span.span: For a thread-safe queue, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的容量是可容纳的元素数。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 当向添加元素时，将根据需要通过重新分配内部数组来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果集合的大小可为估算值，则指定初始容量后，无需在将元素添加到时执行多个大小调整操作。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 可以通过调用来减少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 此构造函数的运算复杂度为 O （1）。This constructor is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了此构造函数和泛型类的几个其他方法。The following code example demonstrates this constructor and several other methods of the generic class. 此代码示例创建具有默认容量的字符串队列，并使用方法将五个字符串进行排队。The code example creates a queue of strings with default capacity and uses the method to queue five strings. 枚举队列的元素，而不会更改队列的状态。The elements of the queue are enumerated, which does not change the state of the queue. 方法用于取消对第一个字符串的排队。The method is used to dequeue the first string. 方法用于查看队列中的下一项， 然后使用方法将其取消排队。 The method is used to look at the next item in the queue, and then the method is used to dequeue it. 方法用于创建数组，并将队列元素复制到该数组，然后将数组传递给采用的构造函数，创建队列的副本。 The method is used to create an array and copy the queue elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the queue. 将显示副本的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 创建队列大小两倍的数组，并使用方法从数组中间开始复制数组元素。An array twice the size of the queue is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 在开始时，将再次使用构造函数来创建包含三个 null 元素的队列的第二个副本。 The constructor is used again to create a second copy of the queue containing three null elements at the beginning. 方法用于显示字符串 "四" 位于队列的第一个副本中，在此之后，方法会清除副本，属性显示该队列为空。 The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the queue, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the queue is empty. remarks.format: ## Remarks 的容量是可容纳的元素数。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 当向添加元素时，将根据需要通过重新分配内部数组来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果集合的大小可为估算值，则指定初始容量后，无需在将元素添加到时执行多个大小调整操作。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 可以通过调用来减少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 按照集合的读取 顺序，将元素复制到。The elements are copied onto the in the same order they are read by the of the collection. 此构造函数是一个 O`n`（）运算， `n`其中是中`collection`的元素数。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `collection`. ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置为零，还会释放对集合的元素的其他对象的引用。 is set to zero, and references to other objects from elements of the collection are also released. 容量保持不变。The capacity remains unchanged. 若要重置的容量，请调用。To reset the capacity of the , call . 修整空会将的容量设置为默认容量。Trimming an empty sets the capacity of the to the default capacity. 此方法是 O （`n`）运算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了泛型类的若干方法， 包括方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class, including the method. 此代码示例创建具有默认容量的字符串队列，并使用方法将五个字符串进行排队。The code example creates a queue of strings with default capacity and uses the method to queue five strings. 枚举队列的元素，而不会更改队列的状态。The elements of the queue are enumerated, which does not change the state of the queue. 方法用于取消对第一个字符串的排队。The method is used to dequeue the first string. 方法用于查看队列中的下一项， 然后使用方法将其取消排队。 The method is used to look at the next item in the queue, and then the method is used to dequeue it. 方法用于创建数组，并将队列元素复制到该数组，然后将数组传递给采用的构造函数，创建队列的副本。 The method is used to create an array and copy the queue elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the queue. 将显示副本的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 创建队列大小两倍的数组，并使用方法从数组中间开始复制数组元素。An array twice the size of the queue is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 在开始时，将再次使用构造函数来创建包含三个 null 元素的队列的第二个副本。 The constructor is used again to create a second copy of the queue containing three null elements at the beginning. 方法用于显示字符串 "四" 位于队列的第一个副本中，在此之后，方法会清除副本，属性显示该队列为空。 The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the queue, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the queue is empty. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用的默认相等比较器 （即队列中的值的类型）来`T`确定相等性。This method determines equality using the default equality comparer for `T`, the type of values in the queue. 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，此方法是 O （`n`）运算，其中`n`是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了泛型类的若干方法， 包括方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class, including the method. 此代码示例创建具有默认容量的字符串队列，并使用方法将五个字符串进行排队。The code example creates a queue of strings with default capacity and uses the method to queue five strings. 枚举队列的元素，而不会更改队列的状态。The elements of the queue are enumerated, which does not change the state of the queue. 方法用于取消对第一个字符串的排队。The method is used to dequeue the first string. 方法用于查看队列中的下一项， 然后使用方法将其取消排队。 The method is used to look at the next item in the queue, and then the method is used to dequeue it. 方法用于创建数组，并将队列元素复制到该数组，然后将数组传递给采用的构造函数，创建队列的副本。 The method is used to create an array and copy the queue elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the queue. 将显示副本的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 创建队列大小两倍的数组，并使用方法从数组中间开始复制数组元素。An array twice the size of the queue is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 在开始时，将再次使用构造函数来创建包含三个 null 元素的队列的第二个副本。 The constructor is used again to create a second copy of the queue containing three null elements at the beginning. 方法用于显示字符串 "四" 位于队列的第一个副本中，在此之后，方法会清除副本，属性显示该队列为空。 The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the queue, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the queue is empty. remarks.format: ## Remarks 的容量是可存储的元素数。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can store. 实际在中的元素的数目。 is the number of elements that are actually in the . 容量始终大于或等于。The capacity is always greater than or equal to . 如果在添加元素时超出容量，则会在复制旧元素并添加新元素之前自动重新分配内部数组，增加容量。If exceeds the capacity while adding elements, the capacity is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了泛型类的多个属性和方法， 包括属性。The following code example demonstrates several properties and methods of the generic class, including the property. 此代码示例创建具有默认容量的字符串队列，并使用方法将五个字符串进行排队。The code example creates a queue of strings with default capacity and uses the method to queue five strings. 枚举队列的元素，而不会更改队列的状态。The elements of the queue are enumerated, which does not change the state of the queue. 方法用于取消对第一个字符串的排队。The method is used to dequeue the first string. 方法用于查看队列中的下一项， 然后使用方法将其取消排队。 The method is used to look at the next item in the queue, and then the method is used to dequeue it. 方法用于创建数组，并将队列元素复制到该数组，然后将数组传递给采用的构造函数，创建队列的副本。 The method is used to create an array and copy the queue elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the queue. 将显示副本的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 创建队列大小两倍的数组，并使用方法从数组中间开始复制数组元素。An array twice the size of the queue is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 在开始时，将再次使用构造函数来创建包含三个 null 元素的队列的第二个副本。 The constructor is used again to create a second copy of the queue containing three null elements at the beginning. 方法用于显示字符串 "四" 位于队列的第一个副本中，在此之后，方法会清除副本，属性显示该队列为空。 The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the queue, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the queue is empty. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法类似于 方法，但 不修改 。This method is similar to the method, but does not modify the . 如果类型`T`为引用类型， `null`则可将添加到作为值。If type `T` is a reference type, `null` can be added to the as a value. 此方法为 O （1）操作。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了泛型类的若干方法， 包括方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class, including the method. 此代码示例创建具有默认容量的字符串队列，并使用方法将五个字符串进行排队。The code example creates a queue of strings with default capacity and uses the method to queue five strings. 枚举队列的元素，而不会更改队列的状态。The elements of the queue are enumerated, which does not change the state of the queue. 方法用于取消对第一个字符串的排队。The method is used to dequeue the first string. 方法用于查看队列中的下一项， 然后使用方法将其取消排队。 The method is used to look at the next item in the queue, and then the method is used to dequeue it. 方法用于创建数组，并将队列元素复制到该数组，然后将数组传递给采用的构造函数，创建队列的副本。 The method is used to create an array and copy the queue elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the queue. 将显示副本的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 创建队列大小两倍的数组，并使用方法从数组中间开始复制数组元素。An array twice the size of the queue is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 在开始时，将再次使用构造函数来创建包含三个 null 元素的队列的第二个副本。 The constructor is used again to create a second copy of the queue containing three null elements at the beginning. 方法用于显示字符串 "四" 位于队列的第一个副本中，在此之后，方法会清除副本，属性显示该队列为空。 The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the queue, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the queue is empty. [!code-csharp[Generic.Queue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Queue/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Generic.Queue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Queue/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已等于容量， 则会自动重新分配内部数组，并将现有元素复制到新数组，然后再添加新的元素。If already equals the capacity, the capacity of the is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new element is added. 如果小于内部数组的容量，则此方法为 O （1）操作。If is less than the capacity of the internal array, this method is an O(1) operation. 如果需要重新分配内部数组以容纳新元素，则此方法将成为 O （`n`）运算，其中`n`是。If the internal array needs to be reallocated to accommodate the new element, this method becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了泛型类的若干方法， 包括方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class, including the method. 此代码示例创建具有默认容量的字符串队列，并使用方法将五个字符串进行排队。The code example creates a queue of strings with default capacity and uses the method to queue five strings. 枚举队列的元素，而不会更改队列的状态。The elements of the queue are enumerated, which does not change the state of the queue. 方法用于取消对第一个字符串的排队。The method is used to dequeue the first string. 方法用于查看队列中的下一项， 然后使用方法将其取消排队。 The method is used to look at the next item in the queue, and then the method is used to dequeue it. 方法用于创建数组，并将队列元素复制到该数组，然后将数组传递给采用的构造函数，创建队列的副本。 The method is used to create an array and copy the queue elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the queue. 将显示副本的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 创建队列大小两倍的数组，并使用方法从数组中间开始复制数组元素。An array twice the size of the queue is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 在开始时，将再次使用构造函数来创建包含三个 null 元素的队列的第二个副本。 The constructor is used again to create a second copy of the queue containing three null elements at the beginning. 方法用于显示字符串 "四" 位于队列的第一个副本中，在此之后，方法会清除副本，属性显示该队列为空。 The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the queue, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the queue is empty. [!code-csharp[Generic.Queue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Queue/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Generic.Queue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Queue/vb/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 返回循环访问 的枚举数。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .
An for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# `for each` 语句（ C++在Visual Basic 中）隐藏了枚举器的复杂性。 `For Each` `foreach`The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 之前， 返回相同的对象。 returns the same object until is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过集合的末尾，则枚举器将定位在集合中最后一个元素之后，并返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时，对的后续调用也将返回。 `false`When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用返回`false`， 则未定义。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 无法再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素；必须改为创建新的枚举器实例。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合所做的更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举器将失效且不可恢复，并且对或的下一个调用将引发。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 中集合的默认实现不同步。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 此方法为 O （1）操作。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了泛型类是可枚举的。The following code example demonstrates that the generic class is enumerable. 语句`foreach` （`For Each` Visual Basic中 `for each` 的C++）用于枚举队列。The `foreach` statement (`For Each` in Visual Basic, `for each` in C++) is used to enumerate the queue. 此代码示例创建具有默认容量的字符串队列，并使用方法将五个字符串进行排队。The code example creates a queue of strings with default capacity and uses the method to queue five strings. 枚举队列的元素，而不会更改队列的状态。The elements of the queue are enumerated, which does not change the state of the queue. 方法用于取消对第一个字符串的排队。The method is used to dequeue the first string. 方法用于查看队列中的下一项， 然后使用方法将其取消排队。 The method is used to look at the next item in the queue, and then the method is used to dequeue it. 方法用于创建数组，并将队列元素复制到该数组，然后将数组传递给采用的构造函数，创建队列的副本。 The method is used to create an array and copy the queue elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the queue. 将显示副本的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 创建队列大小两倍的数组，并使用方法从数组中间开始复制数组元素。An array twice the size of the queue is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 在开始时，将再次使用构造函数来创建包含三个 null 元素的队列的第二个副本。 The constructor is used again to create a second copy of the queue containing three null elements at the beginning. 方法用于显示字符串 "四" 位于队列的第一个副本中，在此之后，方法会清除副本，属性显示该队列为空。 The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the queue, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the queue is empty. [!code-csharp[Generic.Queue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Queue/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Generic.Queue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Queue/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# `for each` 语句（ C++在Visual Basic 中）隐藏了枚举器的复杂性。 `For Each` `foreach`The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 之前， 返回相同的对象。 returns the same object until is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过集合的末尾，则枚举器将定位在集合中最后一个元素之后，并返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时，对的后续调用也将返回。 `false`When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用返回`false`， 则未定义。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 无法再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素；必须改为创建新的枚举器实例。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合所做的更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举器将失效且不可恢复，并且对或的下一个调用将引发。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 中集合的默认实现不同步。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 此方法为 O （1）操作。This method is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对 的访问（线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果对 的访问是同步的（线程安全），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .

value.span: 在 的默认实现中，此属性始终返回 。

span.span: In the default implementation of , this property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中集合的默认实现不同步。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 返回一个对象，该对象可用于同步对 的访问。 returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the . 仅当所有线程在访问集合之前锁定此对象时，同步才有效。Synchronization is effective only if all threads lock this object before accessing the collection. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 中集合的默认实现不同步。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 此方法为 O （1）操作。This method is an O(1) operation.

returns.span: 包含从 复制的元素的新数组。

span.span: A new array containing elements copied from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 未修改。The is not modified. 新数组中元素的顺序与从开始到其结尾的元素的顺序相同。The order of the elements in the new array is the same as the order of the elements from the beginning of the to its end. 此方法是 O （`n`）运算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了泛型类的若干方法， 包括方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class, including the method. 此代码示例创建具有默认容量的字符串队列，并使用方法将五个字符串进行排队。The code example creates a queue of strings with default capacity and uses the method to queue five strings. 枚举队列的元素，而不会更改队列的状态。The elements of the queue are enumerated, which does not change the state of the queue. 方法用于取消对第一个字符串的排队。The method is used to dequeue the first string. 方法用于查看队列中的下一项， 然后使用方法将其取消排队。 The method is used to look at the next item in the queue, and then the method is used to dequeue it. 方法用于创建数组，并将队列元素复制到该数组，然后将数组传递给采用的构造函数，创建队列的副本。 The method is used to create an array and copy the queue elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the queue. 将显示副本的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 创建队列大小两倍的数组，并使用方法从数组中间开始复制数组元素。An array twice the size of the queue is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 在开始时，将再次使用构造函数来创建包含三个 null 元素的队列的第二个副本。 The constructor is used again to create a second copy of the queue containing three null elements at the beginning. 方法用于显示字符串 "四" 位于队列的第一个副本中，在此之后，方法会清除副本，属性显示该队列为空。 The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the queue, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the queue is empty. [!code-csharp[Generic.Queue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Queue/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Generic.Queue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Queue/vb/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void TrimExcess() cil managed

summary.span: 如果元素数小于当前容量的 90%，将容量设置为 中的实际元素数。

span.span: Sets the capacity to the actual number of elements in the , if that number is less than 90 percent of current capacity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有新元素添加到集合中，则可以使用此方法最大程度地减少集合的内存开销。This method can be used to minimize a collection's memory overhead if no new elements will be added to the collection. 但重新分配和复制较大的成本可能很大，因此，如果列表的容量超过 90%，此方法不会执行任何操作。The cost of reallocating and copying a large can be considerable, however, so the method does nothing if the list is at more than 90 percent of capacity. 这样可以避免因相对较小的收益而产生较大的重新分配成本。This avoids incurring a large reallocation cost for a relatively small gain. 此方法是 O （`n`）运算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 若要将重置为其初始状态， 请在调用方法之前调用方法。To reset a to its initial state, call the method before calling method. 修整空会将的容量设置为默认容量。Trimming an empty sets the capacity of the to the default capacity.
